column4: What's the difference between 'apt-get upgrade' and 'apt-get dist-upgrade' ?
apt-get dist-upgrade would upgrade you to the newer Ubuntu, which right now is Breezy, which is very unstable. See !breezy. ;)
You're kidding. How can it take me to breezy if I only have hoary archives in sources.list ?
doesn't look like you ever left. :-/
